fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Trade policy (trade agreements, promoting free and fair trade). Brexit. Policies concerning EWC. Policies related to labour markets.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: The Nordic IN is currently forming its policies on digitalisation and its effects on Trade Union activities.
goals__remit: We gather together 19 Trade Unions in all Nordic countries. These Unions represent more than one million  members working in different blue collar, white collar or academic professions within industry. Nordic IN's task is to promote common interests of its affiliated Unions and act as a link to spreding information to the Unions.
